contents.heading: Unable to login to iGoT
contents.value: Unable to login to iGoT

contents.heading: Unable to logon to iGoT, enclosed blue screen error
contents.value:
Request to kindly clear your cookies and cache of the desktop browser once before trying.
Also you can use Incognito mode or Private Browsing modes of Chrome and IE.
Restart the browser and try accessing iGoT.

contents.heading: Compatibility
contents.value:
It looks like you are using IE in Compatibility Mode (IE7 or IE11) please open developer console and switch to IE11 or IE10.
Please follow the video:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XGEYmkI66jQ

contents.heading: Browser Issue
contents.value: It looks like you are using IE in Compatibility Mode (IE7 or IE11) please open developer console and switch to IE11 or IE10

contents.heading: Regarding iGoT installation on Smart Phone
contents.value: There are 2 ways for doing the same in android:

contents.heading: Issues playing the video content.
contents.value: Please raise a query to reinstall Audio Video Drivers. This issue happens when either audio or video drivers are corrupt or not installed.

contents.heading: Upload a content in iGoT
contents.value:
Please find demo video enclosed on how to upload content in iGoT.
Kindly use the below URL :
 https://eagle-sb.idc.tarento.com/
 Please use Chrome for accessing the staging environment.
To create content through Authoring Tool :
Link : https://eagle-sb.idc.tarento.com/auther/home

contents.heading: Could you please guide me on how to record a video in iGoT with real time voice over.
contents.value:
iGoT does not have the capabilities to record videos or author PDF or HTML Content directly on its authoring tool.
If you have created Videos either using screen-capture using tools like Captivate, Camtasia or converting PPTs to Videos with voiceover or even using a video recording device like Phones, Video Cameras, iGoT allows you to create courses out of such content.
Course creation involves providing a good amount of meta-data for non-text based contents such as Videos.
